snippet: The Supreme Court also ordered that Mrs. Arroyo be released from a Manila hospital where she has been detained since 2012....
abstract: Philippines Supreme Court dismisses corruption charges against former Pres Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, citing insufficient evidence to support allegations that she misused 366 million pesos in lottery funds during her administration; orders Arroyo to be released from Manila hospital, where she has been detained since 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court also ordered that Mrs. Arroyo be released from a Manila hospital where she has been detained since 2012.

headline.main: Philippines Clears Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, Ex-President, of Graft Charges
headline.print_headline: Philippines Clears Ex-President of Graft Charges
